name: Ext_R2_DeviceUseStatement_notes
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.DeviceUseStatement.notes for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceUseStatement.notes from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceUseStatement|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Details about the device statement that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement.
element.definition: `DeviceUseStatement.note` maps to R5 `DeviceUsage.note`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Details about the device statement that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement.
element.definition: `DeviceUseStatement.note` maps to R5 `DeviceUsage.note`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
